description: Sonder The Heid | One-Bedroom Apartment
name: Apartment in Center City
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Sonder (Philly)4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in October 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Oversized warehouse windows, open floor plans, and modern appliances. Once a former manufacturing plant, The Heid was designed with high ceilings and concrete flooring. Each space includes a Roku and in-suite laundry, perfect for a weekend or a year-long stay. Start your day with a coffee on the rooftop. Or stroll through The Rail Park, a nature walk set between soaring skyscrapers. The Callowhill neighborhood is a fusion of art galleries, factories, and live music. Stay for a little or stay for a lot, The Heid has what you want.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Roku and HDMI cord for streaming
- In-suite laundry
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Private workspace
- Sleeper sofa

What’s nearby
- 3 minute walk to Cafe Lift (we recommend the cannoli french toast)
 - 4 minute walk to Prohibition Taproom (gastropub with a large selection of craft beer)
- 10 minute drive to Parc (Parisian-style bistro)
- 8 minute drive to the Liberty Bell

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

We do provide (1) One Parking Spot (small car or small suv) in our dedicated parking lot★ Extremely Safe Quiet neighborhood!★ Security System allows Self Check-in with our Electronic E-Locks. However, a key is needed to enter the building. We have a Lockbox on the premises.★ 18 Mins to Philadelphia International Airport★ 15 Mins to Philadelphia Professional Sports Arenas★ Kitchen: refrigerator, dishwasher, stove/oven, and microwaveFIRST TIME Using AirBNB:I find that guests have the best experience when they read my listing in its entirety, as it likely answers any questions you may have.Please repeat this phrase back to me at the top of your initial message or inquiry:"They call me Chewie” Thank you... Now that was fun, wasn’t it?A Few Old City Highlights- 1/2 mile walk to Amada a local favorite Spanish Cuisine - Tapas Bar!- 10-minute walk to Cuba Libre Cuban Cuisine & late-night salsa dancing- Zahav - Best Restaurant in Old City! You will need a reservation for this hot spot.Long-Term Stays1)	It is required that guests remove garbage from the home during their stay. Any garbage or automotive-related city fines during your stay will be paid by the current guest. We are not responsible for any city fines. 2)	It is required that guests will need to pay for extra cleanings during a long-term stay of 21 days or more. We require that a cleaning of the home is necessary every 2 weeks. Fees will be applied to the platform or payment method of the original reservation. 3)	We may from time to time need to do monthly inspections. Guests will be informed 24 hours prior to arrival.

name: Apartment in Center City
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Frontdesk2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in June 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: All Frontdesk stays are contactless self-check-in and include Scout, our exclusive digital companion to guide you through everything you'll need before and during your time with us. We're also available 24/7 via text or phone and have a local team should you need anything.The spaceOur one-bedroom apartment has everything you & your guests need to enjoy your stay in Philadelphia! In the kitchen, you'll find beautiful appliances, a Keurig coffee maker, and basic cookware to cook simple meals for a cozy night in! There's free WiFi! Our studio and 1 bedroom stays come standard with 3 towels and washcloths. The building is not equipped with an elevator, and there are several stair to contend with on the way to your suite. Please keep this in mind when you are packing for your trip. Parking is not included. The suite is located on a busy street, so it tends to be noisy. Also please note that rooftop access is not allowed.Anything in the apartment is yours to use. Make yourself at home once you arrive. We do not provide any tv cable or streaming services. However, we do offer Roku TV's with apps like Netflix, Prime, Hulu, and more! Feel free to log into the apps with your own login and enjoy.

more description:
Start your stay in Philly at The Terrace with a yearning for travel. Each space is graciously designed with modern kitchen appliances, open floorplans, and a balcony. Need to get some work done? Choose from either your private desk or take the elevator down to the lounge. Or stop by the fitness center for a quick workout.

The city’s most iconic street, Benjamin Franklin Parkway, has incredible destinations in both directions. When it’s time to feast, head over to El Vez for mouthwatering tacos. The Terrace is your perfect getaway.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Chromecast and HDMI cord for streaming
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Sleeper sofa
- Private balcony with Benjamin Franklin Parkway view
- Communal terrace
- Fitness center
- Shared laundry facilities
- Game room

What's nearby
- 10 minute walk to Double Knot (intimate izakaya with top-notch sushi)
- 9 minute walk to Cherry St. Tavern (perfect pints in an ornate wooden interior) 
- 8 minute walk to Peddler (grab your morning pour-over coffee and fresh pastry)
- 6 minute walk to The Franklin Institute (interactive science museum) 

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

more description:
Originally built in 1895, The Witherspoon's beautiful sandstone facade and Corinthian columns have stood the test of time. Inside your space, you’ll find wooden floors, in-suite laundry, and a fully equipped kitchen. Take a trip through Philadelphia’s historical past with a visit to Independence Hall and the Liberty Bell. Then, stroll through Reading Terminal Market, a beloved destination for unique foods and gifts. When you’ve worked up an appetite, Cleavers makes our favorite Philly cheesesteak. At The Witherspoon, an iconic Philadelphia experience is yours to enjoy.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Plenty of space to work
- Chromecast and HDMI for streaming
- In-suite laundry
- Fully equipped kitchen

What’s nearby
- 2 minute walk to Time (whiskey bar with live music)
- 4 minute walk to Green Eggs Café (creative dishes perfect for brunch)
- 5 minute walk to Bud & Marilyn’s (order the fried chicken, it's delicious)
- 7 minute walk to Love Park

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

more description:
655 Lofts is at the heart of Philadelphia’s history, art, and entertainment scenes. The industrial exterior is balanced by the warm furnishings inside. Each space features in-suite laundry and a fully equipped kitchen. Or if you don’t feel like cooking, there’s always Santucci’s pizza downstairs. The rooftop is a perfect place to read a book or connect with new friends over city views. 

In the North Broad neighborhood, Victorian brownstones and modern skyscrapers stand side-by-side. Factory conversions house art galleries, craft breweries, and global eateries. Live jazz and soul food make SOUTH our Friday night favorite. And with The Met, City Hall, and more Philly landmarks nearby, the city is yours at 655 Lofts.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- HDMI cord for streaming
- Paid parking options nearby
- Rooftop
- In-suite laundry
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Sleeper sofa

What’s nearby
- 1 minute walk to Osteria (savory Italian eatery)
- 6 minute walk to The Met Philadelphia (1908-built performance venue)
- 8 minute walk to Prohibition Taproom (we recommend the burger and fries)
- 10 minute walk to Win Win Coffee bar (local beers, coffee, and seasonal eats)

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

more description: There are currently building renovation  projects and related noise in the Rittenhouse Square area. For guest’s convenience we provide bedside white noise machines and earplugs.We have significantly reduced prices for extended stays to support traveling medical professionals & first responders.We’re working hard to keep our Abodes safe and open to anyone who needs them. Check-in is seamless, with no lines to stand in or people to meet to ensure our guests can limit their interaction with othThe spaceAn important note regarding the listing photos:The photos on this listing are a representation of like-units that we offer when booking this listing. Airbnb has recently updated the ways in which hosts can display identical or similar listings in order to allow for greater ease of use when managing greater numbers of properties. While there are some subtle differences between units the fit, finish, furnishings, location, and design aesthetic are all in line with what is displayed on the listing, much like you would find when looking at rooms on a hotel's website. In addition, all information regarding the number of rooms, beds, sleeping accommodations, community amenities, parking availability, etc. are accurate to the listing. While guests are able to request the exact apartment represented in the photos, please note that you may be assigned to a near identical home in the same building. Please do not hesitate to reach out if you have any questions prior to or after booking.My home was built for modern living in Center City Philadelphia. The historic building was completely renovated and retains some of the historic features like exposed brick walls combined with stylish modern interiors and fixtures.My home offers amenities including stainless steel appliances, in-unit washer & dryer, high-end luxury finishes, Restoration Hardware light fixtures, and much more. Philly is an eclectic city and we want nothing more than to help you have a smooth and exciting travel experience. We are passionate about the City of Brotherly Love for it’s history and culture. From the best boutique shops, hottest bars, and historical landmarks we are more than happy to give you recommendations for just about anything so you can live like a local!Your Abode is equipped with a smart TV or streaming device (Roku) which allows guests to access their own streaming accounts that are automatically logged out at checkout. Your Abode does not have cable or satellite service but the streaming device does provide some free TV and movie content.

name: Apartment in Center City
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Sonder (Philly)4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in October 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Complete your Philly experience at The Edison. This modern building perfectly contrasts the Old City neighborhood — known as the country's most historic square mile. Each space features a Roku for streaming, in-suite laundry, and a fully equipped kitchen. Sip a cup of java on the rooftop with breathtaking panoramic views. Or step outside for farm-to-table pasta and sandwiches at High Street on Market. You can also learn about America's birthplace at Independence Hall, just a quick bus ride away.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Smart TV and HDMI for streaming
- Rooftop access 8 am–10 pm

What's nearby
- 4 minute walk to Race Street Cafe (enjoy a pint and American fare in this cozy spot)
- 6 minute drive to Independence Beer Garden (play some outdoor games and lounge with a drink)
- 9 minute walk to Old City Coffee (take a sip of amazing java with beans roasted on-site)
- 7 minute walk to Betsy Ross House (location where the first US flag was sewn)

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

more description: Brand new construction featuring free street parking just outside. You may easily self-check-in/check-out with the electronic entry system. Located in the Fairmount District, one of the most popular destinations in the entire city. Stroll over to the Eastern State Penitentiary, the Philadelphia Museum of Art, or one of the many great restaurants, bars, markets, and cafes just one block south on Fairmount Ave. The subway is just blocks away and an Uber can have you in Center City in minutes.The spaceThis second-floor corner unit features a comfortable full-sized bed and a space for eating, studying, or getting ready. The room has a smart TV with HD antenna, and great views of the city.  Relax after a long day of exploring and enjoy your personal city line view of Philadelphia's gorgeous high-rises. The spacious and tranquil shared bathroom with a large soaking tub is just a few feet away.

more description:
Performing arts, professional sports, and eccentric eateries. This unbeatable location starts with Ovation. The rooftop includes plenty of seating and sweeping city views. Bright white bathrooms, sustainable shower essentials, and spacious living rooms offer modern living in this historic city. Inside each space, you’ll have a full kitchen, in-suite laundry, and Roku TV for streaming. Local theaters put on beloved shows in the Avenue of the Arts neighborhood. Check out Philadelphia’s Magic Gardens for a maze of whimsical sculpture work. Or enjoy a gourmet American-style brunch at Hawthorne’s. Experience Philly like you haven’t before at Ovation. The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in January 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Hi! Welcome to our home! This suite is located next to Fairmount Park on a quiet block, with private parking upon request. The room is very private, with bathroom en suite & smart tv! We are very well located, with access to public bikes and buses. 5min drive to I-76, 2 blocks from the golf range and the frisbee golf course, very close to the famous BoxerTrail, basketball & tennis courts. It is walkable/bikeble to the Boat Houses, Fine Art Museum (Rocky steps), Rodin Museum & Barnes Foundation.The spaceThis is a classic Philadelphia 3 stories row home from the early nineteen hundreds, completely rehabbed in 2020. Each of the 4 bedrooms has it's own bathroom and Smart TV. Guests have access to common areas which include a modern fully equipped kitchen, fully furnished living room, 2 half bathrooms and a rooftop. We have real plants all around the house and up-cycled furniture we built or restored ourselves. We currently do not live on property but everything was of our personal use so we love every single thing in the house. We hope you will respect our home and  enjoy it as much as we do!

unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Sonder (Philly)4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath

more description:
Welcome to Philly’s vibrant art and culinary scene. At The Frankford, Fishtown is your creative escape. Inside your space, modern furnishings and pops of color decorate each room. You’ll have in-suite laundry, a fully equipped kitchen, and a Chromecast for streaming all to yourself. Outside, everything from five-star restaurants to food trucks can be found for those with curious tastebuds. We love the slow roasted lamb with dill and cucumber yogurt from Suraya. Live music radiates from bar patios, and art galleries on Frankford Avenue open their doors every first Friday of the month. If you need a sweet treat, grab some fro-yo from The Igloo and relax on the rooftop at The Frankford. Enjoy the stunning views of downtown Philadelphia, perfect for watching the sunset. Experience the best of the city right at your doorstep.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in 
- 24/7 virtual support 
- Super-fast WiFi
 - Fresh towels and bathroom essentials 
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Chromecast and HDMI cord for streaming 
- Mural in the lobby by a local artist
- Rooftop with 360-degree views
- In-suite laundry
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Patio
- Sleeper sofa

What’s nearby 
- 3 minute walk to Wm. Mulherin’s Sons (1900s whiskey distillery converted to an Italian restaurant)
- 3 minute walk to El Bar (cozy dive bar with live music)
 - 5 minute walk to Front Street Cafe (we recommend the smoked chicken mac and cheese) 
- 4 minute drive to The Fillmore Philadelphia

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

more description: Welcome! You are booking an entire two-story luxury apartment that's large and spacious with 2 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms a courtyard, amazing shower, laundry and FREE (no time limit) parking on the street! You'll be just a 10 min drive to downtown, the convention center, Temple U and ALL the concert halls (Met, Fillmore, Franklin, Union, Sound Garden). description: Sonder The Heid | Studio Apartment w/ Hand-Painted Mural
name: Apartment in Center City
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Sonder (Philly)2 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in October 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Hand-painted murals and oversized industrial windows. Open floor plans and modern appliances. Once a former manufacturing plant, The Heid was designed with high ceilings and concrete flooring. Each space includes a Roku and in-suite laundry, perfect for a weekend or a year-long stay. Start your day with a coffee on the rooftop. Or stroll through The Rail Park, a nature walk set between soaring skyscrapers. The Callowhill neighborhood is a fusion of art galleries, factories, and live music. Stay for a little or stay for a lot, The Heid has what you want.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Roku and HDMI cord for streaming
- In-suite laundry
- Fully equipped kitchen
- City view

What’s nearby
- 3 minute walk to Cafe Lift (we recommend the cannoli french toast)
 - 4 minute walk to Prohibition Taproom (gastropub with a large selection of craft beer)
- 10 minute drive to Parc (Parisian-style bistro)
- 8 minute drive to the Liberty Bell

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.
